content.detailedDescription:
It was july 4, 2013 at approximately 9:45 p.M. it was just dark enough to observe fireworks so i went outside. i looked to the ne and an unknown strange glowing object caught my eye. it wasn't acting like any normal firework, so i sprinted inside and grabbed my video camera.

when i came back outside and started recording, the light was slowly moving south from the northeast, and was not making a sound unless it sounded like popping fireworks. i figured it to be moving maybe 2-5 mph tops. i was startled, and my heart was racing with questions. the more i watched this glowing pulsating red-orange ball the more i began to realize it wasn't normal; it wasn't a plane or a helicopter. as i tried to follow the object with my camera, it was moving away. then it just disappeared like a light switch.

i watched the skies for another minute or so, when, like a light switch, it was back, now due east and twice as high as before. i began filming a second time, but it was just too far away to capture any good quality, as you will see in the first video.

the object appeared to be 1/4 mile away and i could not determine size. from my vantage point, it was the size of a tennis ball. when i first witnessed the object, i knew it wasn't a firework because of its mannerism, shape, and pulsating nature. it was mostly all red with a pulsating orange in the middle. seeing this object really scared me at first, but then i became 100% curious. i still would like to know what it was, as this incident remains in my daily thoughts.

the reason i am coming forward now is because i would like some answers, and if there is a 1% chance of this being a ufo sighting, unlike the government, i would like to make it public knowledge.
content.summary: Slow-moving red/orange pulsating orb observed near lake stevens, wa  july 4, 2013. orb abruptly disappeared, then reappeared at higher altitude and moving  in different direction.

content.detailedDescription: coincidentally , i felt the need to look at the sky , there were many stars but there was something different , it was very bright and flashing , so i quickly photographed and also filmed and put the zoom i could see from the many photos that the shape object initially was the typical shape of a ship. the unidentified object in my first sighting was disc-shaped object is always kept in the same area ( but moving slightly with a speed much higher than a normal plane) subsequently there was a change , also photographed and documented by my photo , with a round shape and then i made ​​the universal greeting from my friend recommended me a passionate argument. during the greeting flashed with a flash effect , after the greeting appeared a new image that sent me back to the classic face of the ufo . the latter also documented . after that the object i reviewed sopostato much more sharply to the right .
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Triangle
content.summary: coincidentally , i felt the need to look at the sky , there were many stars but there was something different , it was very bright and flashing , so i quickly photographed and also filmed and put the zoom i could see from the many photos that the shape o

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my mothers plymouth duster from stoneville road to national mine. don't remember what purpose. as i turned from greenwood street onto washington street. (the locals call the area junction.) i noticed some lights low over the road about 200 yards ahead. at first i thought i was seeing some sort of reflection of lights on top of a railroad structure that was in the area. as i got closer i realized the lights were too big and shone too far across the road to be the railroad lights. at this point there are railroad tracks crossing the road and i had slowed down (there is no signal there, just the x crossing signs.) i realized i was seeing something huge hovering over the road about 100 yards ahead. it extended beyond the road to the left and right. i could see it had large lights (i remember them being green, red and blue. the blue one closest to me and then a red one to the left and green one to the right. my memory is a little unclear about this.) the object was triangular. it just sat there over the road and it was huge. it appeared as i approached to be just hanging there. i rolled down my window as i approached and slowed to probably 15 to 20 miles an hour. (maybe slower i did not look at the speedometer.) i began to pass under the object and realized it was triangular at this point. i passed directly under the point of it. it appeared to taper off to the left and right, as if parked with it's center directly over the road. (a little backtracking here to describe the terrain.) after you cross the railroad tracks going south on washington street. the road dips 10 or 12 feet down for maybe 50 yards or so. possibly a 100 yards. then it rises up steeply raising about 20 feet in elevation. there are houses on the left and right of the road at this point.) as i passed under the point of the object i became aware that the bottom of it had a circular window that was at least as wide as the road itself. i could see that the other points of what appeared to be a triangular object were over the railroad tracks on my left (behind the house.) and beyond the house to my right. maybe 300 feet total. (possible bigger.) i was looking directly up into the object as i approached the rise in the road. i could see the top of someones (somethings?) head moving rapidly around the windowed area. i could see the windowed area was surrounded by what i assumed was the back of some sort of panels. i got the impression that whoever was moving around up there was almost panicky. they were rapidly moving from one point to another as if in a great hurry. i only saw the top of their head. it could easily have been a bald person, but i could not tell. as i came over the top of the rise i saw what i can only describe as a child standing in the middle of the road. (directly where the center line would have been.) i slowed even more with my window down. up to this point i had heard no sounds other than the wind rushing past my window and my tires on the road. the muffler on the car was good and motor sounds were fairly quiet. i passed directly next to the person standing in the middle of the road. he appeared to be wearing a skintight blue silken sort of snowsuit. he (she?) had a hood which clung tightly to his head. he turned to look at me as i passed him, and his face was less than a foot from mine. i cannot remember the face other than it appearing as if he was wearing a sort of semi see through mask that hid his normal features. at this point i began to be afraid. (i was probably 19 at the time.) i began to roll up the window and get the hell out of there. here is where most people start giving me funny looks when i describe what happened next. a large car coming the other way. (i swear it was a cadillac with huge tail fins.) whether it was due to the reddish light shining from above or the car itself it looked pink to me. i could not see the driver because of the headlights, but the car was traveling i could hear it's engine roaring as he revved it up to get out of there. i did the same. i looked in the rear view mirror as i left. i did not see anyone in the road. and the car i had seen was down over the hill before i looked. i drove to my sisters house in national mine. when i came in the door babbling my story my brother in law (a marquette county sheriffs deputy at the time.) asked what i was on. i drew on a paper plate what i had seen for my niece who seemed to believe me. but my sister and her house guests (playing cards) completely ignored my story. or thought i was on drugs. the paper plates are long thrown away. my brother in law has since died of cancer. i really haven't discussed this with too many people. i do often wonder what i saw that night. i wish i could find the person coming the other way but am not willing to come out with the story for fear of ridicule. since this time i have spent 5 years in the air force. i have only seen one other unexplained light in the sky since this time, even though i look often. so there it is. if you wish to contact me via email please do so. i would be interested in hearing if anyone else has reported similar things from that time.
content.summary: Driving from my home to my sisters house. saw object as i turned onto washington street.

content.detailedDescription: The event i want to describe here occurred in the first days (on the 3rd or maybe 4th) of august, 1986. i, together with 3 other male individuals from tbilisi, was camping out in the fields outside the mountain village of omalo, tusheti, east georgia. actually, there was another group of campers nearby, unrelated to us, consisting of approximately 10 persons, two females and about 8 males in 2 tents. next morning they said they were from east georgian town of kaspi. it was well after midnight, about 1.40 am, and my friends were already arranging something in our tent, preparing to go to sleep. i was sitting by the campfire when i noticed some orange lights just appear above the horizon in the west. their colour was bright orange, like that of an ordinary incandescent electric lamp as seen from a distance. at first i thought it was the lights of some motor vehicle moving on the mountain slope (it was very dark so i could not tell where the mountains surrounding the valley actually ended and where the sky began). but within seconds it became clear that the objects were in the skies, just rising above the horizon. they actually rose, i mean they were ascending (very rapidly, although) like the moon or stars do. their entire trajectory, while we could observe them, suggested that they were orbiting the earth. i cried something like ���guys, look at this��� or so, my friends came out of the tent and we watched the objects rapidly rising over the horizon. there were four of them, apparently moving on the earth's orbit approximately from west to east, but soon they smoothly changed direction (the course change was about 45 degrees) and began to rapidly move approximately in south-eastern direction. now we could well see that there were four of them, arranged rhombically, or in a sort of diamond formation - one in the front, two above and below, and the fourth in the rear. they seemed to glow intensely, but did not shimmer. each of them appeared to be bigger than planet jupiter or even venus, but, unlike stars or planets seen in the sky, these objects were well-outlined, did not shimmer as already mentioned, and seemed rather to glow intensely with orange colour. they were very different from the satellites (we saw one, a dim light soon lost of of sight, shortly before the event). soon we heard voices and cries of our neighbours from the nearby campsite, apparently shocked and surprised by the sight. it was the cold war era, we still lived in the former soviet union and i thought we could have witnessed the beginning of a nuclear conflict or something like this. the whole event or sighting was very brief and took, in my evaluation, no more than two or three minutes, or maybe less. no sound or noise was heard. i thought of my photographic camera in my rucksack, but realized that the objects would be gone before i could fetch it, besides, it was unlikely that the camera could produce any discernible image. very soon, the four objects in a diamond formation began to rapidly descend (or appeared to do so) in the direction of the local village of diklo several kilometers away (which we had visited earlier that day) and mt. diklosmta on the border of chechnya (russian federation), and soon disappeared beyond the horizon. in the last moments of the sighting, they appeared to descend vertically, like the setting sun or moon does, what makes me think they were circling our planet on a near-earth orbit. i was relieved to see no explosions, as i had a subconscious fear that it could have been some ballistic missiles. next morning our neighbours broke their camp and moved out. in a brief conversation as they passed by, they said they were also afraid this could have been the start of some sort of a nuclear conflict (it was back in the 1986, you know). we were sure we had witnessed something very unusual and even extraordinary. however, we have not reported the event to any official authorities and have not even discussed the possibility thereof, as we could see no point in doing so. we had no proofs and the sighting itself was too weird for anybody to believe in it. we almost never discussed the incident since then either. i rarely talk about this to anybody. only my wife and son know about my experience. this is actually the first time i officially report the sighting. i was rather skeptical about alleged ufo sightings before this happened to myself, but since then i am sure, the phenomenon does exist. of course, i do not know whether the objects were man-made or extraterrestrial. their extraordinary velocity however makes it very unlikely that they could be man-made. i am also sure that these objects were some kind of apparatus or craft guided by intellectual beings (i mean, it was not a natural phenomenon like atmospheric disturbance or falling meteorite), as far as they circled the earth in a fixed order, following a single course.  i have no wish to prove anything to anybody but i saw what i saw, we all saw this and sooner or later, i am sure, there will be no doubt that such phenomenon really exists. i only wonder, if the beings who apparently directed the objects, are from the outer space, why they are here and what their objectives or intentions are. i hope that my account will give you some additional information, which you may find useful in your investigations. please be free to contact me for any additional information if necessary, preferably via e-mail.
content.summary: 4 (four) separate glowing objects in diamond formation, apparently orbiting the earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on hwy n just approaching the rural intersection with hwy dm. i saw a couple of orange lights appear in the air about a mile distant and a little off to my left, at about 2,000 feet altitude, and for a fraction of a second i thought that they were the landing lights of an airliner that was turning towards me. but landing lights are white, not orange, and the lights then multiplied themselves, forming a random-pattern cluster of lights of different sizes. there were six or seven lights in the cluster. i was slowing for the intersection, when another orange light appeared at about the same distance and altitude, straight ahead, which would have been east of the cluster. after about a second, another identical light appeared to the east of the solitary one, and then two more appeared at evenly spaced time-and-distance intervals continuing east(about 1 second apart) making four in a row that were abreast. i estimate that the array (including the cluster) was about a mile wide. none of the lights moved. the total time of the events was about 10 seconds.

when the fourth light in the row appeared, i had a kind of a 'yee-haw - shades of phoenix!' (which everybody has read about) reaction, anticipating the appearance of more lights (or maybe an immelman, lol). but the show was over, as shortly before i stopped at the intersection, all of the lights summarily disappeared. simply gone, and there had been no motion.

i told my sister about it that evening, and she replied that one of my nephews said he had seen a similar array (five lights, no cluster) only the night before. he said there was also another witness present, a woman who had stopped her car to watch. some wag later reportedly told him that what he had seen was some of those floating chinese lanterns that carry a candle inside. well, if there actually are people who will go out into nowhere on a 10 below zero night to launch mini-hot air balloons, fine. but there is a long distance between the candle power of a one-candle balloon, and a 500,000-candle power landing light, which would approximate the brightness of the cluster that i saw.
content.summary: Orange lights appeared in a cluster and then some more, in a row.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was drive in my car to target at about 9:30pm friday jan 3.Rd 2014 when these orange and white circle object to the sky were moving slow and fast.I didn't know what they were so i pull over to get to take pictures i got a video clip! they were in a straight line then they kept doing formations what looked like the big dipper. it was a trip to have witnessed it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 6 orange and white fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday jan 7 2013 i was on my patio facing east. as i glanced at the sky i noticed a large yellow light come on followed by a 2nd then 3rd, forming a very large triangle shape. this immediately repeated, forming a 2nd triangle. each successive light came on  immediately after previous one had gone off, creating two triangle shapes.  immediately after the 6th lite went out there were 3 flashes behind a cloud to the south of the first lights. (they were at the same interval as the first six so i assume they, again, outlined a triangle). my first thoughts were that 3 semi-circles were made but have since realized it was triangles i had seen being formed.
as far as i could tell all the  lites were equidistant from each other and the two visible triangles created by the lights were identical in size while the 3rd was obscured by a cloud. after giving it some thought, i believe what i saw were 3 "cloaked" black triangle craft flying in formation in southern direction.
   shortly after this happened my satellite  reception  was briefly interrupted for no apparent reason. whether this was related to the sighting or not i don't know but it was unlike interruptions i have had in the past. after it was over i felt kind of awestruck by what had happened. one of my dogs was outside with me and he appeared,uncharacteristically, nervous after going in the house. (it's entirely possible i misinterpreted his actions due to how i was feeling, though)
content.summary: A large yellow light come on followed by a 2nd then 3rd, forming a very large triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house and the power went off so i decided to take a flash light and look around to see if any of my and left a glowing polls were down or if there was a cut or something in wires.  i was using my flashlight to see what i can see on the polls and that's when i saw the object suddenly coming towards me.  and turned off my light and thought what the heck is that.  mind nine year old daughter was with me as well and she got scared and said i wanna go back and the house.
he said that it was saved reddish fireball with a trail behind it the and when it stopped the trail that was behind it would catch up to it and it would hover for a few seconds and then start moving again.  the first came ports and the like saw my the light and when i turned it off it stopped and this thing thing happened.  or i was that was about 100 yards north of my house when i saw the object and then it did the same thing a couple of times and then started going north northeast and a high rate of speed and i lost sight of it.  but my daughter was really scared and i had to comfort her little bit.
the objects like it was coming down towards me when i was using my flashlight as if it had seen it and when i turned it off it stopped over for second two and then left again and this time it seemed like it was going up and a high rate of speed and disappeared. 
the highway that is near my is about 2 miles away.  i don't know what this thing as but i have seen it before and would like to know what it is thank you for helping me.
content.summary: Checking poer lines cause the power was off and saw a reddish-orane orb like come from the south.

content.detailedDescription: My sister stop by to drop off some tupperware as i followed her out to say our goodbyes my sister my mom my daughter and i all were out in front of the house when my sister pointed out the phenomenon in the sky the were bright orange orbs floating high in the sky they formed a triangle facing east with one orb in the center one on the top then it shifted to a v shape facing south thats when two orbs disappeared then each of the lights went out one after another while flickering til there was one left the last one hovered for a good minute til it too disappeared it took place right infront of the orion belt  there was also alot of airtraffic so it must have been extremely high up which is unsettling because the orbs were so large
content.summary: We were saying bye when my sister pointed out the large orange red orbs floating in the sky the shape of a triangle with one orb in the center and one on top a total of 5 they disappeared one at a time the last orb stayed and pulsed a extra minute.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my pooch, tonight at dusk when my dad's spirit, who talks to me all the time, told me to stop looking at the ground as i walked and to look up. i forgot and looked down again a moment later and so my dad's voice said again to look up and see what was there. i looked up and there wasn't a cloud in the sky but only a partial moon not very large.  then when i scanned the sky ahead of me and to the left i saw it...Just what my dad next said he was trying to get me to see on my own. he said that i needed to stop walking with my head down or i'd miss them when they came. the them was the only object aside from the moon in a perfectly cloudless sky. it was an upright shining cloud-like craft i think but with straight well defined edges in what i've read people describe as a cigar shape. it was standing still for a few minutes after i first saw it, not sure what it was doing prior to that, and then it was moving off into the distance in a northerly direction or rather a slightly northwesterly actually. i was at first wondering what the heck a single cloud could be doing in that sky but it was asgain with no fuzzy edges and was so straight up and down the edges and on top and bottom in those small lines too (cigar shaped standning upright) it  was dusk at the time i saw it and it, the cigar shaped cloudlike thing, was glowing white light in a sky only just beginning to get dark. my dad's spirit told me it was an eti craft again, just one unlike the other i'd seen in the past, that one a large disk i could see which was in that case not behind a cloudlike exterior. that was in ireland in the village of kilcrohane over the commonage of a farm on a low mountain in the townland of rhea/reagh.I have had two other experiences but they weren't with craft but rather with visitations by eti. i guess i will now post them here on this site some other time. once was in ireland in january of 2013 and once was in my bedroom in southampton in 2008ish, i don't recall exactly when.
content.summary: Upright cigar-shapped glowing cloud with definite edges in straight lines stationary and then moving at a good pace

content.detailedDescription: Went out to my truck to get something before going to sleep i noticed a low altitude bright light in a pasture across the road. i thought it may be a helicopter and realized it was making little to no noise. hovered unevenly slowly coming my direction and stopping at times. at first i had it really thought a lot than looked up and realized it was coming closer in a odd manner i had never seen before so i started my truck turned the towards the road it was on the other side of and watched it come over the road across from my house and me slightly to the right in idle. i cut the engine to see if i could hear anything thinking it was a drone and realized little to no noise was being made and it seemed wobbly i than turned my truck in its direction trying to catch it in my high beams *only like 50 ft in the air... when i done so the object cut its amber light and gained altitude towards the east at a pretty high rate of speed i followed in my truck attempting to see a shape and was left at the time i had hit roughly 70 mph noticing one small blinking light was flashing on the back quickly disappearing in the distance. this is the second time to encounter something of this nature in the same area the first being 1 or 2 years ago. the flight path was nearly the same coming in. i thought it may be a drone but the size climb rate speed and the fact i was in a very rural area on the edge where two counties meet made me second guess b/c the object disappeared completely when it was crossing into the other county making me think to rule out a "sheriff" due to being out of their jurisdiction and the fact that i doubt our county has a device that could reach speeds and maneuverability as this thing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Amber coloured light hovering in close proximity

content.detailedDescription: Looking out the window in the distance behind the houses across the road above rooftop at my eye level i saw an bject with 4 slowly pulsating, glowing, silent object, that moved slowly to the left hovered went up hovered then went diagonally down till unseen as behind the houses, it had a diamond shame or square but the light where big and bright it was hard to tell
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufro diamond-esk looking 4 big lights very silent moving strange very slow big lights blue green pink white

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on interstate 93 north between exit 39 and 40 with 3 other family members. noticed a double hovering light approximately the size of 2 basketballs. i asked if they saw the lights and 3 stated they did, the other person was younger and did not have a line of sight. as we drove north it appeared to hover in place, i assume somewhere between 200 and 300 feet above treetop level. the occupant in the passenger seat had a better view and stated that there was an additional object just adjacent to this object and it appeared to them as 2 long lights, directly next to each other. we pulled off the highway at exit 40 and the object clearly had 3 lights now all of which were evenly spaced forming a triangular shape and was now moving slowly (similar to a higher flying aircraft, but appeared much closer) in an westerly direction towards the town of  sugar hill. as we witnessed the lights at no time did any of the lights blink, flutter or change.
temperature 17 degrees. mostly clear with limited over cast.
content.summary: 3 stationary lights in triangle, hovered then slowly moved west.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and my mom was eating downstairs with my cousins and then she said that e saw something and at first she believed that was a flying cow and i tought it was like an rc helicopter but then i saw it with my scope and it had like a black box inside. a white shell but the shell haded like 4 sticks around on it 1 in each corner like a square it ascent and it descent over time it also went too high thats when i realized that was no toy i was not scared i dont know why but i felt normal and we lost sight because it flied to the north
content.summary: Black box inside a white shell

content.detailedDescription:
I have just received a phone call from an investigator about a recently reported sighting, and after the brief call concluded, i wondered whether or not i should have mentioned another sighting i had several decades before. here is the brief accounting of that sighting, although the accuracy of the details has faded a bit with time, some aspects remain quite strong.

it was a late summer night in new york city, from 1979 to the early 1980s. i was in my late 20's, and hanging out with a friend on his soho apartment rooftop on sullivan street and prince street several blocks from my thompson and west 3rd street home. it was probably well after midnight to 1:30 in the morning, and we were enjoying the comfortable summer night air and skygazing from reclining metal and web lawn chairs. the night sky in new york is brighter than most because of building illumination, but many stars were visible. (i know there were many visible stars in the sky because it made it that much harder for me to direct my friend's attention to what i later saw). i recall marvelling at the sheer number of stars and at some point remarking offhandedly to my friend, "wouldn't it be neat if we could see a ufo?" within 20 minutes of that silly remark, i shouted "look!" and extended my right arm towards the stars tracing a formation of white light dots racing across the sky from west to east. i probably didn't notice them among the stars until they were 20 to 35 degrees above the western horizon travelling at great speed in a straight line overhead from west to east. from the second i saw them and shouted "look!" and my friend responded but couldn't see where i was pointing among the stars. he shouted "what?" and i shouted back "ufos!" and quickly started counting them. this was hard to do as there were anywhere from 5 to 7 of them and they were moving very fast, in the same direction, although their relative distance from one another shifted rather like birds migrating, some moving closer to one another, then farther apart, some shifting forward, crossing over, others moving back. this made it hard to determine the exact number. before i could complete the count overhead with my skytracing arm of one, two, three, four, five...(and verbalize six and seven) they were past my range of vision behind my head and to the east. i recall ruling out planes or birds because they were white only and moved fast enough to have created a sonic boom but were silent. i don't think they were either brighter nor dimmer than any of the other stars or my friend would likely have quickly spotted what i was seeing and distinguished them from the stars. the only difference was that the were moving, and the way and speed in which they were moving.

i realize that the lack of more specific details makes this report worth very little, but decided to file it anyway.
content.summary: Array of white lights traversing new york city late night sky silently and swiftly from west to east

content.detailedDescription: i came outside to put away the chickens and looked up. a bright glowing orb was high in the sky. then i realized it was not so high.  it looked like one of those battery operated closet lights you click on and off (puck-light.)the lights were in a pentagon configuration with one more in the middle. i thought, "oh wow look at that. it must be some kind of drone." then i realized it was now only 20 feet up, just above the trees. it hovered, slowly rotating as i watched, trying to figure out what it was. then the lights started flashing, changing beautiful blue- green and violet. i thought this was some kind of communication. the lights got lower, maybe 10, 5, 3 feet above the ground. i could hear a whirring noise. as i followed it maneuvered away from me and down the driveway. in my bare feet on sharp gravel and in pitch darkness, i was now afraid, and stopped following. as i watched the glowing flashing lights retreated and disappeared into the woods.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hexagon hovering multicolored lights close

content.detailedDescription: Was shinning flash light on power lines looking for problem and saw something out the corner of eye and looked but object went dark kept looking for problem saw agian same scenario looked and went dark then i grabbed my daughter who was with me put her facing dirction i saw object and told he tolook and i flashed my light in direction and i light up like 4 th of july bright  fire ball then isntantly came at us stoped and went other way
content.summary: Looked like a fireball but saw 2 other rectangular forms in background of light hovered and suddenly came towards us then stoped went other way and dimmed out

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up went to bathroom, after i came back noticed orange grow from window thought the woods might be on fire, so i looked thinking i needed to call 911 to report woods fire saw huge fire like ball in the sky watched as it got bigger then it just darted to the right(north) and vanished 

i did not believe in ufo's to last night
content.summary: Huge fire ball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On january 9, 2014 at 0637 hours. at moses lake, washington i looked up at the stars and notice one of the stars was moving  a south east direction. the object appeared star like with the intensity of planet jupiter.  i took a short video of the object and snap a few pictures. but it was from my phone so the quality is not there. there was no aircraft in the air at the time of incident.
content.summary: Starlike object heading se direction.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 0620 took dog out of house and stood on deck observing the sky. i saw a few stars, and then one in particular caught my eye. at first i thought it might be a planet, but then it moved across the sky traveling from southwest to northeast on a heading of approximately 065 degrees magnetic at great speed. it was higher than the intercontinental commercial jetliners that traverse the east-west corridor; so better than five or six miles altitude. i called my oldest son to come witness it, and we followed it as it went east until hidden by the tree tops. there was no ground wind, the sky was clear, temperature was 28f/16c, it was silent, had no navigation lights, and left no contrail. observation last from one minute to a minute and a half.
content.summary: At first i believed it to be an early morning planet, but its speed across sky was amazing.

content.detailedDescription: It appeared as if a star were moving in a sw direction.  it suddenly stopped about 1/3 of the way across the horizon.  less than "literally" 2 seconds later, a smaller star like object shot from the main star like object and continued on sw.  the original object remained stationary and was could be observed still stationary in the same spot the following night.  it did not have a very intense glow when originally spotted.  i only saw it because it was moving.  i have never observed a conventional aircraft at altitude moving at the speeds of the objects....Let alone come to a complete stop with seemingly no deceleration.
content.summary: Star like object moves and stops

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at traffic lights on erindale road and balcatta road, when just out of the blue a shadow covering a four lane street plus buildings flew over, i saw the shape of it, before it actually made me duck my head and i looked around to the other cars they did the same thing as well.  it's shape which appeared in the middle of the intersection, was a huge triangle , and it actually was quite fast but just enough to see the shape, it just went over in a few seconds maybe ten.  i was taken aback that i called hubby at 12:40pm, the incident happened at 12:32pm cause i automatically looked at my car clock, we had an event like this many many years ago in duncraig where there were quite a few reports about this huge huge shadow going over the suburb.  well, as i drove through intersection i tried to look in review mirror to see if i could identify anything eg. plane or a very huge bird, but didn't see anything and we had clear skies all around, and definitely didn't hear any sound especially on the size of the shadow it cast, i have googled to see if anybody else observed anything but haven't read anything about this incident, here's hoping some one else's saw and reported it, just so i don't think i'm going mad.
content.summary: Was at traffic lights stopped, when this huge shadow went over my car

content.detailedDescription:
For the past few months just after 6pm all the way up untill 12pm i have witnessed some strange very bright amber colored lights rising up above the snohomish valley. these are unlike any normal aircraft i have ever seen. sometimes they rise by themselves, slowly. sometimes they rise up in pairs, and recently i witnessed 3 of them rising up in a arc formation. but they were all very, very close to one another. not something normal aircraft would do. generally they rise up and seem to hover for a minute or two then slowly start heading in a south direction, this is when the bright amber light dims and red and green lights begin to randomly flash like airplanes wingtip lights but both flashing lights are visible along the side of the craft. no noise is ever heard because they are about 5 miles away. i have a vantage point from the top of the valley. i have seen these so regularly lately and i have never seen anything like them, that i decided i wanted to know what these where and drove down into the snohomish valley and tried to get a closer look. this just ended up leaving me more confused. i followed two of these weird acting craft and noticed they seemed to act almost like honey bee's pollinating flowers. they would fly over a residential area, then hover and the amber light would come back on. they would spend several minutes in that same location then the amber light would dim and the green and red flashing lights would turn back on and it would move on a few miles, then stop and hover over some more houses. both the craft i witnessed doing this seemed to stick together the whole time and were never more than a mile or so apart. i was never able to get to more than a mile or so away from these craft, before they would stop hovering and move on. i witnessed this activity for over 30 minutes before i decided to head back home since i wasn't getting any closer to finding out what these where. i reported to local media, but they didn't seem interested.
this past monday while traveling southbound on i405 near woodenville. i witnessed something similar. this time i witnessed one of the brightest white lights in the sky i have ever seen, just hovering maybe a mile away from the freeway. this thing was blinding to look at and i know all the drivers around me witnissed this also because it was so bright. i saw one person pointing. then the bright white light dimmed and it moved maybe another mile to the opposite side of the freeway and this time 4 extremely bright lights lit up across the side of it. these lights were so bright you had to squint your eyes just to see the road ahead and not be blinded. eventually they dimmed again and fly off slowly to the south.
both times, the craft hovered and flew maybe only 500 feet above the ground. no noise was ever heard. and the best way i can describe their flight characteristic was like a bee flying from flower to flower. i wasn't going to file a report till this latest incident happened on 405. it was unreal at the time and hasn't left my mind since.
content.summary: Strange bright amber lights rising above the snohomish valley the past few months

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: There has been a low flying object roughly 5acres away from the back of my house, it's pulsating, and emits other objects much higher, but below the clouds. if it wasn't for the snow and cold weather i could use my camera and get pretty good video evidence of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: For the last month or so, i have observed a flashing object, about 5 acres away from my back window. it starts off by itself and then other objects seem to appear above and below it, which seems dangerous, because its elevation is slightly above the trees

content.detailedDescription:
Waking up   looking straight up  looking like a navy weather baloon
about 2000 feet above me   winds always blowing up there   but it never moved   vern was already fishing    so i thrue in some bacon   and looked up again   it never moved   vern came up with some brook trout  was gonna ask vern what he thought that thing was   but then it was gone   so i didnt bother to ask him

 washakie needles   wy


 one thing    im 81 now     i never forgot that

 many moons later   i had another ---
content.summary: Thought we did that

content.detailedDescription: I was working a night shift outside checking buildings to make sure that the doors were secure when i happened to look up and notice an object that resembled a green star that was moving a rapid pace much faster then any helicopter, because while i was watching this object i could see a helicopter just behind it with blinking lights a little further in the distance. i observed this object moving for a couple of minutes then noticed it changed to a pure white color and changed direction. it started moving fairly quickly at this point. i decided at then to keep my eyes on the object for as long as possible before it was out of sight, but before that happened, i noticed it change completely red and turn direction again. this time it started coming back to the original location i first noticed it at. after a few short minutes i sent a transmission to my partner asking if he was seeing what i was and he said that he noticed the same thing. i was hoping to see the object for a longer time, but it eventually went behind a line of trees and out of sight.
content.summary: Flying object that changes colors

content.detailedDescription:
A simple vista no se ve.... 
pero viendo detenidamente... se localiza y es negro... redondo..
content.summary: Se aprecia entre las nubes....

content.detailedDescription:
1. i stepped outside my home after dark to let my dog take care of business.

2. i was standing facing west when this big boomerang shaped object came over top of the pine trees in back of my home.

3. i thought it was a c141 or aircraft similar until i realized there was no tail section, and it was way to quite.

4. slow moving, to slow to stay aloft like it was. straight line flight out of my sight to the east.

5. my feelings were mostly disbelief of anything that big flying that low, that quite, and that slow. scared my lab. she hauled tail to the house.

6. it went out of sight to the east.
content.summary: Very large, slow movin, boomerang shaped, with a pulsating hum.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking our dogs in a local park.  i noticed a steady light in the sky.  i then noticed that the whole object was changing color from white to yellow to orange to red, then back to white.  it took about 30-45 seconds to go through all of its colors.  i pointed it out to my wife.  we both saw a smaller light drop from the object, it was visible for a second or two before it disappeared.  when it dropped, it was the same color that the bigger object was at that time.    the object was traveling very slowly from the east to the north.  after about 2 minutes we lost sight of the object due to clouds.  the object was at least 2 miles from us, possibly up to 5 miles.  my wife thought it was a helicopter at first, but  after it ejected the smaller object from the bottom and with how slow it was traveling with no sound, we concluded that it wasn't a helicopter.  there were no flashing lights on it like regular aircraft are equipped with.
content.summary: A light in the sky that turned from white to yellow to orange to red.  it ejected a smaller, yet similarly illuminated object from its bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling from fort vermilion ab to edmonton ab canada on hwy.35
on the end of january of 1978 and a temperature of -35celsius. the year is vivid because i had received my night endorsement on my pilots license a few weeks before.I was driving my farm truck at the time. about 2hrs into the trip,on a remote streach of road between keg river and
manning and between 7pm & 8pm.( the time is correct because i was listening
to the first period of a peace river/grimshaw hockey game).. i saw a meteor come in at an almost vertical
angle right in front of my vision.  i didn,t think to much of it but remember thinking that it must have struck ground as it appeared to have done just that. the night was clear with a full moon reflecting off the snow.Just a great night to travel. anyway i was on a long straight stretch of road leading to what is called the 100 mile hill. as i neared the hill 
 a bright light left on an almost vertical trajectory upwards and with the same speed that i had seen the perceived meteor fall 3 to 5 minutes earlier. 
holy crap....No way... no damn way...I,m seeing things here...
no this happened....Not a chance...Whoa....I,m alone...What happened here stays here...Not gunna be the butt of ridicule...Never mentioned a thing since to anyone..I am now 65 yrs old..
dave

about 10 yrs. later while playing cards with an older couple(they were in their 80,s),and i,m not sure how the subject came up,but they told of
how in the middle 50,s a circular craft landed in a field beside them
while on a trip to spirit river alberta canada.( this happened close to a town called whitelaw)the lights of their car and the motor shut off until
the craft left. they obviously were very shaken at the time.They told only 
their daughters and a son of the incedent. and then my wife and i at the card game.Being well respected members and business people of peace river
ab they told only a select few. of course we enjoyed the good natured 
banter about who was smoking what, but the overall message was very serious.
i thought back to my encounter, and said to myself that was a reality
even though i stored it on the back burner.I have still not mentioned this 
to anyone.
with the new technologies of today and the  vastness of new found worlds,
there is no daught in my mind that we are no where near being alone.
i am so happy to make peace with that fact to myself this many years later.
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw meteor coming in almost vertically.Thought nothing of it. approx. 5 minutes later the object left, as fast as it came.
